quote: It always seems impossible until it's done.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.
author: Albert Einstein

quote: How lucky I am to have something that makes saying goodbye so hard.
author: Winnie the Pooh

quote: Debugging is like being the detective in a crime movie where you are also the murderer.
author: Filipe Fortes

quote: I'm not superstitious, but I am a little stitious.
author: Michael Scott

quote: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take. - Wayne Gretzky
author: Michael Scott

quote: The will of man is his happiness.
author: Friedrich Schiller

quote: How far have we come, how far will we go?
author: Unknown

quote: We stand on the shoulders of giants.
author: Unknown

quote: If you just focus on the smallest details, you never get the big picture right.
author: Rick Rubin

quote: I like to make music sound as good as it can in as few steps as possible.
author: Rick Rubin

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Keep your face always toward the sunshine - and shadows will fall behind you.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Do anything, but let it produce joy.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: A morning-glory at my window satisfies me more than the metaphysics of books.
author: Walt Whitman

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never failing, but in rising up every time we fail.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Donâ€™t watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
author: Sam Levenson

quote: Forever is composed of nows.
author: Emily Dickinson

quote: People generally see what they look for, and hear what they listen for.
author: Harper Lee

quote: The only true wisdom is in knowing you know nothing.
author: Socrates

quote: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The only thing we have to fear is fear itself.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: The only thing we never get enough of is love; and the only thing we never give enough of is love.
author: Henry Miller

quote: You can cut all the flowers but you cannot keep Spring from coming.
author: Pablo Neruda

quote: The only thing that will redeem mankind is cooperation.
author: Bertrand Russell
